questions.text: Who wakes up in the bathtub?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Adam ends up waking up in the bathtub and when he gets out, the whole story begins.  He and Lawrence are trapped in a dingy bathroom with chains around their ankles.

questions.text: When Adam and Lawrence find envelopes in their pockets, what is one thing that Lawrence doesn't find within his?
questions.explanation:
A note.

	Lawrence's tape says that the only way he can leave the room is if he shoots and kills Adam otherwise his family will die and he and Adam will be left within the room.

questions.text: What is the name of Lawrence's wife?
questions.explanation:
Alison.

	Alison is played by Monica Potter who also appeared in "Along Came a Spider", and is a star on the TV show "Boston Legal".  Allison and Diana are held hostage while Lawrence is still playing Jigsaw's game.

questions.text: How many saws does the Jigsaw killer leave in the room containing Lawrence and Adam?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	Adam finds the saws within the tank of the toilet in the room, but when he tries to cut his ankle chain, the saw breaks apart.  Lawrence realizes that the saws weren't meant for their chains, but they were meant for their feet.

Photographer.

	Adam was hired by Tapp to take photographs of Lawrence, after Amanda was spared by the Jigsaw killer.  That's one of the reasons why Adam is with Lawrence in the room.

questions.text: Who is killed first: Sing or Tapp?
questions.explanation:
Sing.

	When Sing and Tapp are investigating Jigsaw's apartment, Jigsaw returns home, and when Tapp and Sing are chasing him, Sing hits a tripwire causing him to be shot in the head.  Jigsaw gets away and Tapp regrets letting him go.

questions.text: When Lawrence and Adam find the X on the wall, what do they find hidden within the wall?
questions.explanation:
A case.

	Within the case (opened by the key in Lawrence's envelope) they find a cell phone for incoming calls, two cigarettes, and a note.  On the note, Jigsaw implies that Lawrence doesn't need a gun to kill Adam, but he could poison one of the cigarettes with the poison on the ground in the bathroom.

questions.text: Who cuts off their foot with a saw?
questions.explanation:
Lawrence.

	Lawrence decides that he needs to save his family, so he uses the saw for what it's meant for by cutting off his foot.  It not known whether or not Lawrence lives at the end of the movie.

No.

	After cutting off his foot, Lawrence shoots Adam with the bullet he received in his envelope and the gun in the dead body's hand.  Zep enters the room and says that he didn't make the deadline, but Adam wakes up and kills Zep.

False.

	It turns out that the Jigsaw Killer had chosen Zep as another victim because Adam finds a tape on Zep's body.  The real killer was in the room the whole time, because he was the dead body.  In the end, the dead body (who wasn't dead after all) rises from the ground and tells Adam that the key to his lock is in the bathtub, but Adam knows that the key went down the drain.  He shuts the door and leaves Adam in the dark.
